name: New Breakout Classic
description:
This is a classical breakout game. You can break blocks by striking back a ball. You get higher score when a ball break many blocks in a row.

This game contains 500 stages. (200 easy stages, 120 normal stages, 120 difficult stages and 60 ultimately difficult stages)

You can get coins to power up yourself (bar speed, life counts, item rate and so on)
developers: 株式会社龍野情報システム
